title: Fusion MicroFinance to raise $25 mn from DFC
description: Fusion MicroFinance is raising $25 million from the US International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) for growth capital, following a $20 million loan facility. The micro loan lender has already received $20 million from DFC. Fusion, founded in 2010, has assets under management of Rs 11,476 crore.
